sentences.en: ...their belief that human souls were reincarnated in the bodies of turtles.
sentences.cn: ...他们认为人的灵魂转世投胎到海龟身体里的信仰。

sentences.en: Some people believe they may reincarnate in the form of an animal.
sentences.cn: 有些人相信他们死後可能转生为动物.
